errors.channelNameDuplicate: Channel with name {{ channelName }} already exists

createChannel.description: A channel is a way to group people together around a project, a topic, or just for fun. You can create as many channels as you want.

nameInput.label: Name
nameInput.maxLengthValidationError: Name can be max {{ max }} characters long!
nameInput.regexValidationError: Channel names can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.

topicInput.label: Topic (optional)
topicInput.topicHelp: What is the channel currently dealing with? (Displayed in header)
topicInput.maxLengthValidationError: The topic can be a maximum of {{ max }} characters long!

descriptionInput.label: Description (optional)
descriptionInput.maxLengthValidationError: Description can be max {{ max }} characters long!

isPublicInput.label: Private Channel / Public Channel
isPublicInput.explanation: People will need an invitation to join a private channel. Everybody can join a public channel.
